name: Ashmarch Footsoldier
flavor_text: Step light, breathe shallow. The ash remembers every trespass.

name: Moltenback Drake
flavor_text: Wings of cinder, hunger of a furnace—anything it circles, it claims.

name: Cindermane Lion
flavor_text: Even its roar is smoke that claws at the sky.

name: Drumfire Strike
flavor_text: Three beats. One spark. Then the world becomes percussion.

name: Forge Pulse
flavor_text: The mountain never sleeps—its heartbeat just runs hotter.

name: Forge Choir Captain
flavor_text: Every hammer blow is a note; every spark, a stanza.

name: Blazetongue Bard
flavor_text: His verses scorch the air long before the flames do.

name: Brassclad Duelist
flavor_text: He polishes his armor with the heat of battle—literally.

name: Blazing Crescendo
flavor_text: When the final chord hits, even stone dares not stand.

name: Ash Vein Quarry
flavor_text: The deeper they dig, the louder the mountain growls.

name: Vulcanic Harbinger
flavor_text: It comes not to warn, but to announce.

name: Forge Golem Mk.IV
flavor_text: Built to withstand molten rivers—and pilot them.

name: Symphony of Sparks
flavor_text: The forge conducts, the flames perform.

name: Heartforge Tunnel
flavor_text: Travelers swear they can hear the mountain breathing.

name: Varetha Ironvoice, Doom Drummer
flavor_text: He doesn’t keep the beat. He commands it.

name: Song of the Mountain Forge
flavor_text: Sing loud enough, and the mountain sings back.

name: Ramdelom’s Heart-Titan
flavor_text: Born from pressure, crowned in fire.

name: Ramdelom’s Core
flavor_text: A heartbeat too hot for mortal hands.

name: Ruby Miner
flavor_text: Some seek jewels. Some find them.

name: Ruby Stalwart
flavor_text: Heat tempers steel—but will alone tempers warriors.

name: Mirrorfin Scout
flavor_text: What it sees, the sea soon knows.

name: Glasswing Diver
flavor_text: Glass wings don’t break—they bend the ocean to lift them.

name: Refractor Owl
flavor_text: It stares straight through you and studies the echo.

name: Counterwave
flavor_text: Every spell has a ripple. Every ripple can be unmade.

name: Echo Vision
flavor_text: See the moment twice—once as it was, and once as it could be.

name: Scholar of Whessa
flavor_text: To learn from reflections is to learn twice as fast.

name: Illusionist Adept
flavor_text: Reality is merely a polite suggestion.

name: Crystal Navigator
flavor_text: The sea is glass, and she reads its cracks like maps.

name: Fractal Mirage
flavor_text: Touch it, and you become part of the pattern.

name: Blue Vein Lab
flavor_text: Where ideas fracture, recombine, and crystallize.

name: Reflection Serpent
flavor_text: If it coils around your image, run—it prefers the original next.

name: Deep Equation
flavor_text: The deeper the proof, the colder the truth.

name: Mirror Reef
flavor_text: Every tide rearranges the mirrors—and the creatures behind them.

name: Archon Lirane Voss, Reflector Prime
flavor_text: One thought, held perfectly still, can reshape a world.

name: Aether Whale
flavor_text: It swims between possibilities, grazing on unrealized futures.

name: Whessa’s Reflection
flavor_text: To see her face is to question your own.

name: Whessa’s Core Spiral
flavor_text: Knowledge condensed until it sings.

name: Sapphire Diver
flavor_text: Where others drown, she simply listens.

name: Mirror Architect
flavor_text: He builds houses for thoughts that haven’t yet been imagined.

name: Leafrunner Scout
flavor_text: Trust her footprints—they’re already growing over.

name: Tonebird Flock
flavor_text: Their songs root themselves in your bones.

name: Mosswolf Pup
flavor_text: Small as a leaf, loud as a storm.

name: Grow Pulse
flavor_text: The land swells, inhales, and decides to thrive.

name: Song of Renewal
flavor_text: A melody that invites the world to start again.

name: Vine Harpist
flavor_text: One pluck, and vines hurry to listen.

name: Verdant Shaman
flavor_text: He speaks for the soil, and the soil roars back.

name: Chordvine Panther
flavor_text: Each step is a chord struck on living strings.

name: Lifeweaver’s Tune
flavor_text: A lullaby that knits flesh and stem.

name: Rootspire Garden
flavor_text: Roots climb here—not down.

name: Bloom Stag
flavor_text: Its antlers bloom with seasons that haven’t happened yet.

name: Root Sentinel
flavor_text: Unmoving, but never still.

name: Overgrow
flavor_text: When the land has had enough, it takes everything back.

name: Heartbloom Crater
flavor_text: A wound healed too quickly—and too powerfully.

name: Bessalynn, Tiravel’s Flutist
flavor_text: Her song coaxes sap into symphony.

name: Verdant Colossus
flavor_text: A walking season.

name: Tiravel’s Harmony
flavor_text: Where the harmony settles, peace grows.

name: Tiravel’s Heartroot
flavor_text: e root that remembers every melody.

name: Emerald Forager
flavor_text: She gathers not for hunger, but for balance.

name: Heartlistener Monk
flavor_text: Stillness is just another form of growth.

name: Grave Acolyte
flavor_text: He prays not for souls, but for their echoes.

name: Echo Moth Swarm
flavor_text: They gather around the dying, hungry for final words.

name: Shadow Rat
flavor_text: Small, silent, utterly unforgiving.

name: Funeral Toll
flavor_text: One ring for grief. Two for the forgotten.

name: Dark Reprise
flavor_text: The dead don’t rise to fight—they rise to finish the song.

name: Bellkeeper Exile
flavor_text: He was cast out for hearing too clearly.

name: Crypt Sentinel
flavor_text: Only the dead may pass. Others merely try.

name: Soul Lantern Warden
flavor_text: The light inside flickers to the rhythm of stolen names.

name: Bell of Remembrance
flavor_text: It rings once for each regret.

name: Obsidian Vein
flavor_text: A seam of black that bleeds memory.

name: Grave Siren
flavor_text: It sings you to rest—but never to peace.

name: Bellframe Guardian
flavor_text: The frame stands even when the bell shatters.

name: Silence the Pulse
flavor_text: Stop the heartbeat, stop the hope.

name: Black Bell Cavern
flavor_text: In the dark, the bells ring themselves.

name: Bellkeeper Nahl, Hollow Monk
flavor_text: His voice is gone—his echoes, never.

name: The Pale Regent
flavor_text: A ruler crowned in quiet.

name: Dirge of N’kurath
flavor_text: A melody that demands surrender.

name: Echo Core Depths
flavor_text: Whispers fall here and never climb out.

name: Onyx Supplicant
flavor_text: Kneel once—and forget why you rose.

name: Gravetone Acolyte
flavor_text: He writes his prayers in dust and shadow.

name: Moon Raven
flavor_text: It glides on thought more than wind.

name: Dreamheart Fawn
flavor_text: Born from a dream someone forgot they had.

name: Echo Spirit
flavor_text: A whisper given shape.

name: Lullaby Veil
flavor_text: Sleep settles softly—then refuses to leave.

name: Mind Echo
flavor_text: The thought you lost comes back sharper.

name: Mindpetal Mystic
flavor_text: She blooms new ideas in anyone who listens.

name: Dreamsinger Monk
flavor_text: His chants ripple like moonlit water.

name: Lucid Seer
flavor_text: She knows the future because she dreamed it first.

name: Dream Refrain
flavor_text: One note caught between waking and not.

name: Amethyst Riftpool
flavor_text: A pool that reflects only possibilities.

name: Aurora Serpent
flavor_text: It slithers between colors no one can name.

name: Dream Sentinel
flavor_text: Silent, still, but always inside your thoughts.

name: Moonlight Chorus
flavor_text: A thousand soft voices, none belonging to mortals.

name: Aurora Well
flavor_text: Drink, and remember someone else’s dream.

name: Mother Iryl, Voice Between Realms
flavor_text: She sings where the worlds overlap.

name: Lytheran Dreamwalker
flavor_text: He strolls across reflections of dreams.

name: Lythera’s Awakening
flavor_text: Her first breath reshaped the horizon.

name: Lytheran Nexus
flavor_text: All dreams lead here—eventually.

name: Amethyst Dreamer
flavor_text: He sees the world as it could be, not as it is.

name: Lytheran Prophet
flavor_text: Truth tastes different in dreams.

name: Crystal Nomad
flavor_text: Wandering until the colors align.

name: Resonance Surge
flavor_text: When light remembers how to sing.

name: Alloyed Guardian
flavor_text: A body of metal, a heart of harmony.

name: Dualflame Beast
flavor_text: Two fires, one purpose: burn brighter.

name: Prismatic Flux
flavor_text: Color unbound becomes power unrestrained.

name: Hybrid Experiment
flavor_text: Success is measured in how long it survives.

name: Prism Knight
flavor_text: Each strike radiates a different oath.

name: Fifth Song Fragment
flavor_text: A lost note that hums with unfinished promise.

name: Fused Beast of the Veins
flavor_text: It moves like a storm of colors fighting for shape.

name: Aurora Titan
flavor_text: Every step rewrites the sky.

name: Call of the Sixth Song
flavor_text: A summons that resonates across realms.

name: Prism Warden
flavor_text: Keeper of colors no eye has seen.

name: Harmonic Rift Core
flavor_text: A heart beating to six different rhythms at once.

name: Varetha Ironvoice, Doom Drummer
flavor_text: Her drumbeat pierces the veil between sound and fury.

name: Archon Lirane Voss, Reflector Prime
flavor_text: In stillness, she divines entire timelines.

name: Bessalynn, Tiravel’s Flutist
flavor_text: Her flute carries a forest’s memory.

name: Bellkeeper Nahl, Hollow Monk
flavor_text: His silence strikes harder than any bell.

name: Mother Iryl, Voice Between Realms
flavor_text: She whispers songs meant for the spaces between dreams.

name: Aurora Titan
flavor_text: A prism given purpose and mass.

name: Ramdelom’s Heart-Titan
flavor_text: The heart burns hotter in this telling.

name: Lytheran Dreamwalker
flavor_text: He journeys across dreams that dare not wake.
